t_q8: Having sexual intercourse with survivors within the advised three months of abstenance. Accomodating strangers who may have the virus. Sharing of sharps with infected persons such as blade, needle,etc
t_q9: No one is allowed to visit sick or dead persons. Hunting and travelling are prohibited
t_q10: The use of condoms for survivors is not encouraging, the government needs to provide provisions for survivors to stay at home until after three months for them not to infect others, The reopening of borders and restructuring of marketting days
t_q11: The community can work well with their action plans but the obstacle amongst others is family influence and poor network coverage to call 117. The delay of burial team to respond in time
